_sText:
By Nathaniel Miller AKA NIPPER 
(nippermaps AT gmail.com)
maps @ www.geocities.com/nipper14223

Hollywood, 1939.
Amid the glitz and glitter of a bustling 
movie town, at the height of it's golden 
age, the Hollywood Tower Hotel was a star 
in it's own right, a beacon for the 
show-business elite..

The Tower of Terror ride at Disney’s MGM Studios 
is under attack!  As part of Disney’s standard 
emergency procedure the giftshop merchandise 
has been evacuated.
